mapper.select: SELECT EMPNO , EPW , E_ROLE , ENAME FROM EMP WHERE EMPNO = #{empno} AND E_ACCOUNT =1

SELECT EMPNO , (REPLACE(TRIM(ENAME),' ', '')) AS ENAME , EPW , TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOIN_DATE , DENAME , E_JOB , EMP.DEPTNO , LOC , E_STATUS , E_ACCOUNT , DECODE(E_STATUS, 1, '재직중', 2,'휴직', 3,'퇴직') AS E_STATUS_STR , DECODE(E_ACCOUNT, 1, '정상', 2,'휴면') AS E_ACCOUNT_STR , DECODE(E_ROLE, 'USER', '직원', 'ADMIN','관리자','SUPER_ADMIN','책임 관리자') AS E_ROLE FROM EMP EMP, DEPT DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO
AND UPPER(${searchKeyword}) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'
ORDER BY EMPNO DESC OFFSET #{offsetCnt} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{displayCnt} ROWS ONLY

SELECT DISTINCT EMP.EMPNO, REPLACE(TRIM(ENAME),' ', '') AS ENAME, DENAME, E_JOB, LOC, E_STATUS, DECODE(E_STATUS, 1, '재직중', 2, '휴직', 3, '퇴직') AS E_STATUS_STR, PHONE_TEL, OFFICE_TEL, (SELECT ATTACHED_FILE_NAME FROM E_IMG WHERE EMPNO=EMP.EMPNO) AS ATTACHED_FILE_NAME FROM EMP EMP, DEPT DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO
AND ( UPPER(EMP.ENAME) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{searchValue}) || '%' OR UPPER(DEPT.DENAME) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{searchValue}) || '%' OR UPPER(EMP.EMPNO) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{searchValue}) || '%' OR UPPER(EMP.E_JOB) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{searchValue}) || '%' OR UPPER(DEPT.LOC) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{searchValue}) || '%' )
ORDER BY EMPNO DESC

SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(EMPNO) FROM EMP EMP, DEPT DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO
AND UPPER(${searchKeyword}) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'

SELECT EMP.EMPNO , EMP.DEPTNO , LOC , DENAME , EPW , ENAME , E_JOB , TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOIN_DATE , E_EMAIL , PHONE_TEL , OFFICE_TEL ,(SELECT ORIGIN_FILE_NAME FROM E_IMG WHERE EMPNO=EMP.EMPNO) AS ORIGIN_FILE_NAME ,(SELECT ATTACHED_FILE_NAME FROM E_IMG WHERE EMPNO=EMP.EMPNO) AS ATTACHED_FILE_NAME , E_STATUS FROM EMP EMP, DEPT DEPT WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO AND EMPNO = #{empno} AND ROWNUM = 1
mapper.update: MERGE INTO E_IMG USING DUAL ON (EMPNO = #{empno}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET IMG_CODE = (SELECT 'IMG_'||LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(IMG_CODE,5))), 0)+1 ,3,'0')FROM E_IMG), ORIGIN_FILE_NAME = #{originFileName}, ATTACHED_FILE_NAME = #{attachedFileName} WHERE EMPNO = #{empno} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (IMG_CODE, ORIGIN_FILE_NAME, ATTACHED_FILE_NAME, EMPNO) VALUES ( (SELECT 'IMG_'||LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(IMG_CODE,5))), 0)+1 ,3,'0')FROM E_IMG), #{originFileName}, #{attachedFileName}, #{empno})

UPDATE EMP SET ENAME = #{ename}, DEPTNO =#{deptno}, E_JOB =#{eJob}, E_EMAIL =#{eEmail}, OFFICE_TEL =#{officeTel}, PHONE_TEL =#{phoneTel}, E_STATUS = CASE WHEN #{eStatus} = 1 THEN CASE WHEN #{selectedEStatus} = 2 THEN 2 WHEN #{selectedEStatus} = 3 THEN 3 ELSE 1 END WHEN #{eStatus} = 2 THEN CASE WHEN #{selectedEStatus} = 1 THEN 1 WHEN #{selectedEStatus} = 3 THEN 3 ELSE 2 END WHEN #{eStatus} = 3 THEN CASE WHEN #{selectedEStatus} = 1 THEN 1 WHEN #{selectedEStatus} = 2 THEN 2 ELSE 3 END ELSE #{eStatus} END WHERE EMPNO = #{empno}

UPDATE EMP SET E_STATUS = CASE WHEN #{eStatus} = 1 THEN CASE WHEN #{selectedEStatus} = 2 THEN 2 WHEN #{selectedEStatus} = 3 THEN 3 ELSE 1 END WHEN #{eStatus} = 2 THEN CASE WHEN #{selectedEStatus} = 1 THEN 1 WHEN #{selectedEStatus} = 3 THEN 3 ELSE 2 END WHEN #{eStatus} = 3 THEN CASE WHEN #{selectedEStatus} = 1 THEN 1 WHEN #{selectedEStatus} = 2 THEN 2 ELSE 3 END ELSE #{eStatus} END, E_ACCOUNT = CASE WHEN #{eAccount} = 1 THEN CASE WHEN #{selectedEAccount} = 2 THEN 2 WHEN #{selectedEAccount} = 3 THEN 3 ELSE 1 END WHEN #{eAccount} = 2 THEN CASE WHEN #{selectedEAccount} = 1 THEN 1 WHEN #{selectedEAccount} = 3 THEN 3 ELSE 2 END WHEN #{eAccount} = 3 THEN CASE WHEN #{selectedEAccount} = 1 THEN 1 WHEN #{selectedEAccount} = 2 THEN 2 ELSE 3 END ELSE #{eAccount} END WHERE EMPNO = #{empno}
mapper.select: SELECT EMP.EMPNO, EMP.DEPTNO, DEPT.LOC, DEPT.DENAME, EMP.EPW, EMP.ENAME, EMP.E_JOB, TO_CHAR(EMP.JOIN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOIN_DATE, EMP.E_EMAIL, EMP.PHONE_TEL, EMP.OFFICE_TEL, E_IMG.ATTACHED_FILE_NAME AS ATTACHED_FILE_NAME, EMP.E_STATUS FROM EMP JOIN DEPT ON EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO LEFT JOIN E_IMG ON E_IMG.EMPNO = EMP.EMPNO WHERE EMP.EMPNO = #{empno} AND ROWNUM = 1
